verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3068><s%>, I am the Lord your God <S%H430><s%>.

After the doings <S%H4639><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, where you lived <S%H3427><s%>, shall you not do <S%H6213><s%>: and after the doings <S%H4639><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, where I bring <S%H935><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, shall you not do: neither shall you walk <S%H3212><s%> in their ordinances <S%H2708><s%>.
You shall do <S%H6213><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> my ordinances <S%H2708><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> in it I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

You shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and my judgments <S%H4941><s%>: which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%>, he shall live <S%H2425><s%> in them <S%H3068><s%>: I am the Lord.
None of you shall approach <S%H7126><s%> any <S%H376><s%> that is near <S%H7607><s%> of kin <S%H1320><s%> to him <S%H1540><s%>, to uncover their nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>, or the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your mother <S%H517><s%>, shall you not uncover <S%H1540><s%>: she is your mother <S%H517><s%>; you shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.
The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> shall you not uncover <S%H1540><s%>: it is your father <S%H1><s%>'s nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your sister <S%H269><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>, or daughter <S%H1323><s%> of your mother <S%H517><s%>, whether she be born <S%H4138><s%> at home <S%H1004><s%>, or born <S%H4138><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%>, evening their nakedness <S%H6172><s%> you shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%>.

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your son <S%H1121><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, or of your daughter <S%H1323><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, evening their nakedness <S%H6172><s%> you shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%>: for theirs <S%H2007><s%> is your own nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, fathered <S%H4138><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>, she is your sister <S%H269><s%>, you shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.
You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>'s sister <S%H269><s%>: she is your father <S%H1><s%>'s near kinswoman <S%H7607><s%>.
You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your mother <S%H517><s%>'s sister <S%H269><s%>: for she is your mother <S%H517><s%>'s near kinswoman <S%H7607><s%>.

You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>, you shall not approach <S%H7126><s%> to his wife <S%H802><s%>: she is your aunt <S%H1733><s%>.

You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your daughter in law <S%H3618><s%>: she is your son <S%H1121><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>; you shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.
You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your brother <S%H251><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>: it is your brother <S%H251><s%>'s nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.

You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> and her daughter <S%H1323><s%>, neither shall you take <S%H3947><s%> her son <S%H1121><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, or her daughter <S%H1323><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>; for they are her near kinswomen <S%H7608><s%>: it is wickedness <S%H2154><s%>.

Neither shall you take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to her sister <S%H269><s%>, to vex <S%H6887><s%> her <S%H1540><s%>, to uncover her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>, beside the other in her life time <S%H2416><s%>.
Also you shall not approach <S%H7126><s%> unto a woman <S%H802><s%> to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>, as long as she is put apart <S%H5079><s%> for her uncleanness <S%H2932><s%>.
Moreover you shall not <S%H5414><s%> lie <S%H7903><s%> carnally <S%H2233><s%> with your neighbour <S%H5997><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, to defile yourself with her <S%H2930><s%>.

And you shall not <S%H5414><s%> let any of your seed <S%H2233><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire to Molech <S%H4432><s%>, neither shall you profane <S%H2490><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of your God <S%H430><s%>: I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
You shall not lie <S%H7901><s%> with mankind <S%H2145><s%>, as with <S%H4904><s%> womankind <S%H802><s%>: it is abomination <S%H8441><s%>.

Neither shall you <S%H5414><s%> lie <S%H7903><s%> with any animal <S%H929><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> yourself with it neither shall any woman <S%H802><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> a animal <S%H929><s%> to lie down <S%H7250><s%> with it <S%H8397><s%>: it is perversion.

Defile <S%H2930><s%> not you yourselves in any of these things <S%H428><s%>: for in all these the nations <S%H1471><s%> are defiled <S%H2930><s%> which I cast out <S%H7971><s%> before you <S%H6440><s%>:

And the land <S%H776><s%> is defiled <S%H2930><s%>: therefore I do visit <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> there upon it <S%H776><s%>, and the land itself vomits out <S%H6958><s%> her inhabitants <S%H3427><s%>.

You shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%> and my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and shall not commit <S%H6213><s%> any of these abominations <S%H8441><s%>; neither any of your own nation <S%H249><s%>, nor any stranger <S%H1616><s%> that stays <S%H1481><s%> among you <S%H8432><s%>:

(For all these <S%H411><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> have the men <S%H582><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> done <S%H6213><s%>, which were before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H776><s%>, and the land is defiled <S%H2930><s%>;)
That the land <S%H776><s%> vomit not you out <S%H6958><s%> also <S%H2930><s%>, when you defile it <S%H6958><s%>, as it vomited out the nations <S%H1471><s%> that were before you <S%H6440><s%>.

For whoever shall commit <S%H6213><s%> any of these abominations <S%H8441><s%>, even the souls <S%H5315><s%> that commit <S%H6213><s%> them shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their people <S%H5971><s%>.

Therefore shall you keep <S%H8104><s%> my ordinance <S%H4931><s%>, that you commit <S%H6213><s%> not any one of these abominable <S%H8441><s%> customs <S%H2708><s%>, which were committed <S%H6213><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H2930><s%>, and that you defile not yourselves in it I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
